Generation III.Ruby: Altaria dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this Pok é mon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.
Generation III.Sapphire: Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds. This Pok é mon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.
Generation III.Emerald: It hums in a beautiful soprano voice. It flies among white clouds in the blue sky. It launches intensely hot fireballs from its mouth.
Generation III.FireRed: If you hear a beautiful melody trilling deep among mountains far from people, it is Altaria 's humming.
Generation III.LeafGreen: If you hear a beautiful melody trilling deep among mountains far from people, it is Altaria 's humming.

Generation IV.Diamond: It looks like a fluffy cloud when it is in flight. It hums with its soprano voice.

Generation IV.Platinum: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.

Generation IV.SoulSilver: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you're in a dream.
